description: Project-wide instructions for GitHub Copilot agent
---

# Copilot Instructions

This file provides team and project-specific guidelines to help GitHub Copilot generate code that matches our standards and practices.

## Coding Standards
- Use XML documentation comments for C#.
- Prefer async/await for C# and TypeScript code.
- Use Angular best practices for TypeScript (e.g., use services for business logic, prefer OnPush change detection, follow Angular style guide).

## Technologies & Tools
- Use xUnit for C# testing.
- Use npm and ESLint for TypeScript projects.

## General Practices
- Follow .NET coding conventions for C#.
- Follow TypeScript style guide.
- Write clear, maintainable, and well-documented code.

## How to Update
Edit this file to add or change instructions as your team practices evolve. Copilot will use these guidelines to improve its suggestions for this project.
